name: WP-Email-Notificator
author: Rafael Poveda - RaveN from Mecus.es

sections.description:
This plugin notifies by email in the WordPress.com way to all your subscriptors. It notifies in its first release:

  • Posts
  • Edits in posts
  • Pages
  • Edits in pages
  • Comments
  • Edits in comments

The comments are shown threaded.

New options to come. See roadmap.

Roadmap

0.3

  • Custom from e-mail
  • Custom logo
  • Custom custom footer
  • Add screenshots

0.4

  • Select whether notify edits in posts or not.
  • Select whether notify edits in pages or not.
  • Select whether notify edits in comments or not.
  • Select whether notify posts or not.
  • Select whether notify pages or not.
  • Select whether notify comments or not.

0.5

  • Add options to user profile (the subscriptor can select what to be notified)

1.0

Format improvements:

  • Repair visualization of [caption]
  • Select the format of the comments
  • Select custom colors / change HTML design
  • Add categories
  • Add tags
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-notificator folder to /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • First Release.

0.2

  • Exclude SPAM comments from notifications

0.2.1

  • Stand by for the plugin
